parameters.name: units
parameters.help: In which units will CAVE compute.

parameters.name: interocularDistance
parameters.help: Default distance between eyes in centimeters. This may affect the 3D effect.

parameters.name: left
parameters.help: The images may not appear on this projection wall.

parameters.name: right
parameters.help: The images may not appear on this projection wall.

parameters.name: front
parameters.help: The images may not appear on this projection wall.

parameters.name: floor
parameters.help: The images may not appear on this projection wall.

parameters.name: displayMode
parameters.help: If on, the application will render images in 3D (If supported).

parameters.name: originLeftDistance
parameters.help: Left wall distance from the center of the projection (in meters).
